traits.name: Amorphous
entries: The oblex can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Aversion to Fire
entries: If the oblex takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Pseudopod
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4 damage) psychic damage.
